/usr/bin/c++     -Wall -pthread -march=i686 -ffunction-sections  -O3 -DNDEBUG  -fomit-frame-pointer -O3 -ffast-math -msse -msse2 -mfpmath=387 -DNDEBUG         CMakeFiles/opencv_haartraining.dir/haartraining.o  -o ../../../../../bin/opencv_haartraining -rdynamic ../../../../../lib/libopencv_core.so.2.2.0 ../../../../../lib/libopencv_imgproc.so.2.2.0 ../../../../../lib/libopencv_highgui.so.2.2.0 ../../../../../lib/libopencv_objdetect.so.2.2.0 ../../../../../lib/libopencv_calib3d.so.2.2.0 ../../../../../lib/libopencv_haartraining_engine.a ../../../../../lib/libopencv_objdetect.so.2.2.0 ../../../../../lib/libopencv_calib3d.so.2.2.0 ../../../../../lib/libopencv_highgui.so.2.2.0 ../../../../../lib/libopencv_imgproc.so.2.2.0 ../../../../../lib/libopencv_core.so.2.2.0 ../../../../../3rdparty/lib/libopencv_lapack.a ../../../../../3rdparty/lib/libzlib.a -ldl -lm -lpthread -lrt -Wl,-rpath,/home/gcamilo/kmouse/Kinect-Mouse/Mouse-ntk/build/lib:
